changeSet.author: MineStar

preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored defaulting of blend method as either BLEND table or its BLEND_METHOD column does not exist.

changeSet.comment: FLT-4817 - Default blend method to rolling type
changeSet.sql: update BLEND set blend_method = 'ROLLING_MASS' where BLEND_METHOD is null and CONTROL_MASS is not null and CONTROL_MASS > 0
update BLEND set blend_method = 'ROLLING_WINDOW' where BLEND_METHOD is null and CONTROL_DURATION is not null and CONTROL_DURATION > 0
